author: Marketing Department
title: Michael Dell doing the job on VMware reverse-merger aspects
text:
Michael Dell doing the job on VMware reverse-merger aspects   
Drew Angerer | Getty Photos 
Michael Dell, CEO of Dell Inc., attends the annual Allen & Corporation Sunlight Valley Conference on July eight, 2016. 
Michael Dell and his advisers are starting to concentrate on the aspects of a reverse merger with VMware to get Dell Technologies again into the community industry, while any remaining conclusion or offer is much more than a month absent, stated persons familiar with the issue. Leave a Reply
